asset.description: Name of the sound asset to play

chance.description: Probability of the sound playing each interval, between 0.0 and 1.0

description: Set the ambient sounds for the biome. These sounds must be in the 'individual_named_sounds' in a 'sounds.json' file.

addition.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position

loop.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome

mood.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby air block position when the light level is low. Biomes without an ambient mood sound will use the 'ambient.cave' sound.

underwater_addition.description: Named sound that occasionally plays at the listener position when underwater

underwater_loop.description: Named sound that loops while the listener position is inside the biome and underwater

underwater_mood.description: Named sound that rarely plays at a nearby water block position when the light level is low. Biomes without an underwater ambient mood sound will use the 'ambient.underwater.loop' sound.

title: minecraft:ambient_sounds
